head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SULLIVAN, JOHN M.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SULLIVAN, JOHN M.

block.p: SULLIVAN-John M., 60. Of Hardyston Twp, NJ, died on Tuesday, January 7, 2003. Chief Financial Officer for Harrison and Star Business Group in New York City, NY, retired in 1998. Husband of Maureen Sullivan (nee Roettger). Father of Jennifer and Wendy Sullivan. Brother of Margaret Vickers, Barbara Schimpf and Patricia Sullivan. Funeral Mass at St. Francis DeSales RC Church, Vernon Twp, NJ on Saturday at 10AM. Burial at Glenwood Cemetery, Vernon Twp, NJ. Visiting at Ferguson-Vernon Funeral Home, Vernon, NJ, Friday 2-4 & 7-9PM. Donations to Karen Ann Quinlan Center of Hope Hospice, 99 Sparta Ave, Newton, NJ 07860
